Uses of Class
biweekly.io.TimezoneAssignment

  • Packages that use TimezoneAssignment 
    Package Description
    biweekly.io
    Contains I/O related classes.
    biweekly.io.json
    Contains classes for reading and writing jCals (JSON-encoded iCalendar objects).

    • Uses of TimezoneAssignment in biweekly.io

      Fields in biweekly.io declared as TimezoneAssignment 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected TimezoneAssignment StreamWriter.globalTimezone 
      Methods in biweekly.io that return TimezoneAssignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TimezoneAssignment TimezoneAssignment.download(TimeZone timezone, boolean outlookCompatible)
      Creates a timezone whose VTIMEZONE component is downloaded from tzurl.org.
      TimezoneAssignment TimezoneInfo.getDefaultTimezone()
      Gets the timezone to format all date/time values in (by default, all dates are formatted in UTC).
      TimezoneAssignment WriteContext.getGlobalTimezone()
      Gets the global timezone to format all date/time values in, regardless of each individual ICalendar's timezone settings.
      TimezoneAssignment StreamWriter.getGlobalTimezone()
      Gets the timezone that all date/time property values will be formatted in.
      TimezoneAssignment TimezoneInfo.getTimezone(ICalProperty property)
      Gets the timezone that is assigned to a property.
      TimezoneAssignment TimezoneInfo.getTimezoneById(String tzid)
      Gets the timezone whose VTimezone component contains a TimezoneId property with the given value.
      TimezoneAssignment TimezoneInfo.getTimezoneToWriteIn(ICalProperty property)
      Determines the timezone that a particular property should be formatted in when written to an output stream.
      Methods in biweekly.io that return types with arguments of type TimezoneAssignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<TimezoneAssignment> TimezoneInfo.getTimezones()
      Gets all the timezones assigned to this object.
      Methods in biweekly.io with parameters of type TimezoneAssignment 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TimezoneInfo.setDefaultTimezone(TimezoneAssignment timezone)
      Sets the timezone to format all date/time values in (by default, all dates are formatted in UTC).
      void StreamWriter.setGlobalTimezone(TimezoneAssignment globalTimezone)
      Sets the timezone that all date/time property values will be formatted in.
      void TimezoneInfo.setTimezone(ICalProperty property, TimezoneAssignment timezone)
      Assigns a timezone to a specific property.
